item.title: Cast your iPad's Screen to Linux
item.description: Overview This post is going to explain how to record the screen of your iPad and stream it to your Linux system with latencies of about two seconds. Unfortunately Apple makes things quite a bit more complicated as they have to be to keep you within their walled garden, so lets see how to break free. There are three components to the solution I found: An app to stream the screen of your iPad to a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) server.
